Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/37th
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB:Kedzie, Pershing, California and 36th Pl.; SB Kedzie, 36th, California and Pershing :due to, street blockage near Kedzie/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie//37th due to street blockage near Kedzie/37th.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Pershing, California and 36th Place including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, 36th, California and Pershing..

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Harold Washington Library
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Harold Washington Library due to  fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Harold Washington Library due to fire department activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • Orange Line trains will operate via the Outer Loop
  • Pink Line trains will operate from Eastbound from 54th/Cermak to Adams/ Wabash and turn at 14th middle and operate Westbound to 54th/Cermak

Bus shuttle service is available from Roosevelt to Halsted in both directions to provide connecting service for the Orange Line.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near Archer/47th
ShortDescription: Northbound 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, 47th, Kedzie and Archer due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, 47th, Kedzie and Archer due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
